value.title: DAX Fridays! #95: Binning, Frequency and relative frequency | Data profiler
value.excerpt: This is the first of a series of videos about data profiling and descriptive statistics. In today's video, I will show you how to bin data,  calculate the frequency and relative frequency using DAX.  What you think about the series? let me know in the comment box. value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.  LINK to NFL site: http://www.nfl.com/stats/categorystats?tabSeq=2&offensiveStatisticCategory=TEAM_PASSING&conference=ALL&role=TM&season=2015&seasonType=REG
